text: تم إعادة ضبط المتغيّرات

actions.text: Welcome to ParentText. Every parent everywhere needs support. We hope we can help. 💚

text: مرحبًا في نصائح للوالدين. كل أب وأم بحاجة للدعم. بنتمنى إنه نقدر نساعدكم. 💚

actions.text:
*A Friendly Chat*

Talk to your children about something that they are interested in! 😃

⚽ An easy way to start talking to your children is to ask them about something they are interested in. For example, you could talk about local stories, traditions, sports, favourite books, friends, music, famous people or something they have been learning about.

👂 You may not find everything your children share to be interesting, but it’s important to show enthusiasm and an eagerness to learn. 

Paying attention to what matters to your children can make a big difference in your relationship and their happiness.

text:
*دردشة ودية*

احكي مع أطفالك عن إشي بيثير اهتمامهم!😃

⚽ طريقة سهلة لبدء الحكي مع أطفالك هي إنك تسألهم عن إشي مهتمين فيه. مثلاً، فيك تحكي عن قصص محلية، أو تقاليد، أو رياضة، أو كتب مُفضَّلة، أو أصدقاء، أو موسيقى، أو شخصيات مشهورة أو إشي ليتعلموا.

ممكن يشاركك أطفالك بأمور غير مهمة لك، على الرغم من ذلك اظهر الاهتمام والرغبة في معرفة المزيد.

اهتمامك باللي أطفالك بيهتموا به بيفرق كثير في علاقتكم وسعادتهم.

actions.text:
*Reflect on Hope*

Spread Hope! 

💡 Together, take a minute to think about all the things you did today. 

☀️ Take turns sharing one positive thing that happened. This could be something small or big, like feeling good because you took a pause to take some deep breaths, exercised like walking or stretching, or spent time with people you care about.

⏰ Try doing this every day - even more on the days it feels like you have not done anything special.

text:
فكّر بالأمل

انشر الأمل!

خدوا لحظة مع بعض علشان تفكروا في كل الأشياء اللي عملتوها النهارده.

بدّلوا الأدوار وشاركوا إشي إيجابي صار. ممكن يكون إشي صغير أو كبير، مثلاً حسيتوا حالكم منيح لأنكم تنفستوا بعمق، أو مارستم رياضة مثل المشي أو تمرينات الإطالة والتمدد أو قضيتوا وقت مع ناس بتهتموا فيهم.

حاولوا تعملوا هاي الإشي كل يوم- وخصوصًا بالأيام اللي بتحسوا فيها ما عملتوا إشي مميز.

actions.text:
*What’s New?*

Learning is fun! 🎓

❓ Ask your children to think of a new, fun skill you could learn together. 
For example, keeping a ball in the air with your foot, learning and practising local language phrases, sharing stories from your culture, playing local games and sports, or learning a new song.

🔄 Take turns trying out the new skill. Make sure to praise each other and learn and play together!
💛 Approach learning the skill in a kind and fun way, and do not judge your children or yourself for your ability in the skill.

text:
*شو الجديد؟ *

التعلم ممتع!🎓

اطلب من أطفالك يفكروا في مهارة جديدة ومرحة تتعلموها معًا.
مثلًا، تخلوا الكرة ثابتة في الهواء برجليكم، تتعلموا وتتمرنوا على عبارات من لهجتنا، تشاركوا قصص من ثقافتكم، تلعبوا ألعاب ورياضات بلادنا، أو تتعلموا أغنية جديدة.

🔄بدّلوا الأدوار وجربوا المهارة الجديدة. تأكدوا أنكم تمدحوا بعض وتتعلموا وتلعبوا مع بعض!
💛تعامل مع تعلم المهارة بطريقة لطيفة وممتعة، وما تحكم على أطفالك أو على حالك بسبب قدرتك وتمكن مهارتك.

actions.text:
*Check-in Chat*

Actively checking in on one another helps to keep relationships healthy! ⭐
Ask each other questions like: “What made you happy today?” 👂 “What was difficult today?” 👂 “How can I help you?” 👂
For this to help, your children need to feel safe while sharing things with you. Be open to their responses. 💚

Older children tend to be more honest when they trust that what they say will not be used against them later.
Be kind to yourself if your children do not want to share their problems with you. 💙 Often, children are afraid to share as they are scared they will get in trouble. Getting upset with them won’t help - keep showing you love them and give them time! 🌷

text:
دردشة للتفقد

سؤالكم عن بعض بيساعد تحافظوا على علاقاتكم منيحة!
اسألوا بعضكم أسئلة مثل: "شو أسعدك النهارده؟" 👂 "شو كان صعب النهارده؟" 👂 "كيف بقدر أساعدك؟" 👂
علشان هاي الشي يفيد، لازم أطفالك يحسوا بالأمان وهم بيحكوا معك. خليك متقبل لردودهم. 💚"

الأطفال الكبار سنًّا بيكونوا أصدق لما بيثقوا إنه اللي بيحكوه ما راح يستعمل ضدهم بعدين.
كون لطيف مع حالك إذا أطفالك ما بدهم يحكولك مشاكلهم. 💙 غالبًا الأطفال بيخافوا يحكوا لأنهم بيخافوا يتورطوا بمشاكل. الزعل منهم ما راح يفيد - أظهر لهم إنك بتحبهم واعطيهم وقت! 🌷"

actions.text:
*Express Yourself*

Movement makes people happy!
This game can be played in pairs or as a group - stand facing each other or in a circle.
🎵 Together, choose a song, a fun sound, or a clapping pattern to follow and choose a person to start the game by creating one movement.
👀 The person to their right must copy that movement and add their own movement to it.
✨ Go around the circle, each person adding a new movement.

🔄 The first one who forgets someone's movements or does it in the wrong order chooses the next song, sound, or pattern and starts the game again.

🎉 Have fun trying out different movements together with this fun game.

text:
*عبر عن نفسك*

الحركة بتخلي الناس مبسوطة!
يمكن لعب هاي اللعبة كأزواج أو كمجموعة - الوقوف قدام بعض أو في شكل دايرة.
🎵 مع بعض، اختاروا أغنية، أو صوت ممتع، أو نمط تصفيق تتبعوه، واختاروا شخص يبدأ اللعبة بحركة واحدة.
👀 الشخص اللي على يمينه لازم يقلد الحركة هادي ويضيف حركته الخاصة.
✨ لفوا بالدايرة، وكل شخص يضيف حركة جديدة.

🔄 أول واحد ينسى حركة حدا أو يعملها بالترتيب الغلط هو اللي يختار الأغنية، أو الصوت، أو النمط التالي ويبدأ اللعبة من جديد.

🎉 استمتعوا مع بعض وجربوا حركات مختلفة مع هذه اللعبة الممتعة.

actions.text:
*2 Truths, 1 Lie*

This is a fun, quick game, and the point of it is to learn things about each other. Make your answers as interesting as possible! 🎨
💡 Everyone thinks of 3 facts about themselves. 2 must be true, and 1 must be a lie. 
🔷 Here are some examples: I hate cold weather, I love cold ice cream, and my favourite thing to learn about is maths.
👀 Share your facts with your children and ask them to guess which one is a lie. 
🔄 Now ask them to do the same, and guess theirs.
Did you learn anything new about your children, or did they learn anything new about you? 💛

text:
حقيقتان وكذبة

هاي لعبة سريعة ومسلية، والهدف منها نتعلم أشياء عن بعض. خلي إجاباتك ممتعة قدر الإمكان!
كل واحد يفكر في تلات حقائق عن حاله. تنتين لازم يكونوا صح، وواحدة لازم تكون كذبة.
هاي شوية أمثلة: باكره الجو البارد، وبحب البوظة الباردة، وأكتر إشي بحب أتعلمه هو الرياضيات.
شاركو الحقائق مع أطفالكم واطلبوا منهم يخمنوا الكذبة.
ودلوقتي اطلبوا منهم يعملوا نفس الإشي، وخمنوا حقائقهم.
هل تعلمتوا إشي جديد عن أطفالكم أو تعلموا إشي جديد عنكم؟

actions.text:
*Yes, No or Maybe*

Are you tired of hearing your children say yes, no, or maybe to all of your questions? Turn your chat into a game, and don’t allow one-word answers. 🎈

🔴 Older children are known to give one-word answers to avoid talking. 
💡 When you would like to really know how your children are doing, you can turn your chat into a game. 
⭐ Take turns asking each other questions. The only rule is that you cannot use one-word responses like Yes, No, Maybe, Fine, and Okay.
⚽ You can ask about things your children like or what they did today. For example, how was your day? What are you excited about? What is one thing that is worrying you today?
🔄 It is important to let your children ask you questions as well. Trust is built when your children can see that you are also sharing your life with them and not only trying to learn about their life.

text:
نعم، أو لا أو يمكن

زهقتوا من إجابة أطفالكم بنعم، لا، يمكن على كل أسئلتكم؟ حولوا دردشتكم للعبة، وما تسمحوا بالإجابة بكلمة وحدة.

الأطفال الكبار معروفين إنهم بيعطوا إجابات بكلمة واحدة عشان يتجنبوا الحكي.
لو بدك تعرف عن جد كيف حال أطفالك، ممكن تحول الدردشة معهم للعبة.
بدّلوا الأدوار واسألوا بعض أسئلة. القاعدة الوحيدة إنكم ما تستعملوا إجابات بكلمة واحدة مثل نعم، أو لا، أو يمكن، أو منيح، أو تمام
ممكن تسأل عن شغلات أطفالك بيحبوها أو شو عملوا النهارده. مثلًا، كيف كان يومك؟ شو الإشي اللي متحمسين ليه؟ شو الإشي اللي مقلقكم النهارده
مهم إنك تخلي أطفالك يسألوك كمان. الثقة بتنبني لما أطفالك يشوفوا إنك بتشارك حياتك معهم، مش بس بتحاول تعرف أكتر عن حياتهم.

actions.text:
*Get Active*

Exercise is a great way to spend time together, and it is so good for your health🌱. Find an exercise activity that both you and your children want to do and try it out together! Be mindful of the safety of the space you are using for exercise. 

⏰ Even walking for 10 minutes a day is good for you. 
⚽Together, try walking, running, stretching, playing games like hide-and-seek, or any other physical activities you enjoy.

🏆 Together, think of ways to make it even more fun. Can you run to a certain point? Take turns being the coach? Can there be a small, free reward like getting to decide the next activity?
Exercise becomes easier and more enjoyable the more you do it. 
🔄 If you or your children do not like the first type of exercise you pick, try a new way to exercise.

text:
تحرّكوا

ممارسة الرياضة طريقة ممتازة تقضوا فيها وقت مع بعض، وهي كتير منيحة لصحتكم. دوَّر على نشاط رياضي أنت وأطفالك بدكم تعملوه وجربوه معًا! انتبه على أمان المكان اللي بتستخدموه للرياضة.

حتى المشي لمدة 10 دقايق باليوم منيح لكم.
جربوا تمشوا، أو تركضوا، أو تلعبوا ألعاب الإطالة، أو ألعاب مثل الغميضة معًا، أو أي نشاطات بدنية تانية بتستمتعوا فيها.

فكروا معًا في طرق تخلي اللعبة ممتعة أكتر. بتقدروا تركضوا لنقطة معينة؟ تتبادلوا أدوار المدرب؟ بتقدروا تحطوا مكافأة صغيرة ومجانية زي إن الفائز يقرر النشاط الجاي؟
الرياضة بتصير أسهل وأمتع لو مارستوها أكتر وأكتر.
لو أنت أو أطفالك ما حبيتوا أول نوع رياضة اخترتوه، جربوا طريقة جديدة للرياضة.

actions.text:
*Take a Pause With Your Children*

Take a pause with your children. This helps them deal with stress in a healthy way!
⏰ You could take a pause together at any time, or you could try at a specific time like before bedtime.
👂 Sit down together and close your eyes. Listen to your breath as it goes in and out. Notice how you feel. 
⭐ Take 5 more deep breaths.

*Take a Pause With Your Children*

Take a pause with your children. This helps them deal with stress in a healthy way!
⏰ You could take a pause together at any time, or you could try at a specific time like before bedtime.
👂 Sit down together and close your eyes. Listen to your breath as it goes in and out. Notice how you feel. 
⭐ Take 5 more deep breaths.

👀 When you are ready, open your eyes again. Do you feel any different? 
⏸ Ask your children what it was like to take a pause. Listen and accept whatever they say about it.

text:
*خد استراحة مع أطفالك*

خد استراحة مع أطفالك هاي بيساعدهم يتعاملوا مع الإجهاد بطريقة صحية!
ممكن تاخدوا استراحة معًا في أي وقت، أو ممكن تجربوا في وقت محدد مثل قبل النوم.
اقعدوا معًا وسكروا عيونكم. اسمعوا أنفاسكم وهي داخلة وخارجة. لاحظوا كيف بتحسوا.
تنفسوا بعمق 5 مرات كمان.

*خد استراحة مع أطفالك*

خد استراحة مع أطفالك هاي بيساعدهم يتعاملوا مع الإجهاد بطريقة صحية!
ممكن تاخدوا استراحة معًا في أي وقت، أو ممكن تجربوا في وقت محدد مثل قبل النوم.
اقعدوا معًا وسكروا عيونكم. اسمعوا أنفاسكم وهي داخلة وخارجة. لاحظوا كيف بتحسوا.
تنفسوا بعمق 5 مرات كمان.

لما تكونوا جاهزين، افتحوا عيونكم مرة تانية. حسيتوا بفرق؟
اسأل أطفالك كيف كانت الاستراحة. اسمع وتقبل أي إشي بيحكوه عنها.

actions.text:
*This Is Who I Am*

Self-esteem is the way you value yourself, either in a positive or negative way. Helping your children have high self-esteem is a recipe for success! 🏆
⭐Share with your children 3 things you like about yourself!
3️⃣ Ask your children to tell you 3 things they like about themselves.
For example, I am great at treating others kindly. I am great at playing football. I am great at drawing flowers. If this is too hard, try thinking of just one thing.

text:
*هاد هو أنا*

تقدير الذات هو الطريقة اللي بتقيم فيها حالك، سواء بطريقة إيجابية أو سلبية. مساعدة أطفالك يكون عندهم تقدير عالي للذات هي وصفة للنجاح!
شارك مع أطفالك 3 شغلات تحبها في حالك!
اطلب من أطفالك يحكولك 3 شغلات بيحبوها في حالهم.
مثلًا، أنا ممتاز في معاملة الناس بلطف. أنا ممتاز في لعب كرة القدم. أنا ممتاز في رسم الزهور. لو هاي كان صعب، حاولوا تفكّروا في إشي واحد بس.

actions.text:
*Weekly Goal Setting*

Let’s set some goals ⭐

⏰ It can be helpful to set smaller weekly goals that are easier to reach, especially when life feels uncertain. 
 
💡Ask each of your children for one goal that they would like to achieve this week. 

🔄 Make sure this goal is *specific* and *achievable* to reach in 1 week, like: practising deep breathing for 5 minutes every day, exercising for 10 minutes three times a week, journaling feelings every night, or spending quality time with family or friends daily.

💚 You can also share your own weekly goals with your children and support each other so you can both achieve your goals.

🎉 Make sure to praise and celebrate your children for their hard work towards reaching their goals.

🔔 If your children do not reach their goals, that is okay. Discuss with them the steps they still need to take or how they could reach it a different way.

text:
*تحديد هدف أسبوعي*

يلا نحط شوية أهداف

رح يكون مفيد إنو نحط أهداف أسبوعية أصغر وأسهل في الوصول ليها، خصوصًا لما الأمور تبدو محيرة.
  
اطلب من كل واحد من أطفالك هدف بده يحققه هالأسبوع.

تأكد إن هاي الهدف *محدد* و*قابل للتحقيق* خلال أسبوع، مثل يتمرنوا على التنفس بعمق 5 دقايق كل يوم، أو يتمرنوا رياضة 10 دقايق 3 مرات بالأسبوع، أو يكتبوا مشاعرهم بمذكرات كل ليلة، أو يقضوا وقت مميز مع العائلة أو الأصحاب كل يوم.

ممكن كمان تشارك أهدافك الأسبوعية الخاصة مع أطفالك وتدعموا بعض علشان تحققوا أهدافكم.

تأكد من مدح أطفالك والاحتفال بتعبهم في تحقيق أهدافهم.

لو ما حقق أطفالك أهدافهم، لا مشكلة. ناقش معهم الخطوات اللي بيحتاجوها أو كيف ممكن يوصلوا لأهدافهم بطريقة تانية.

actions.text:
*One-on-One Time*

💚 Spending time just with your children and taking an interest in them can improve your relationship. 

👀 When your children are playing alone or occupying themselves, join them and show interest in what they are doing.

👂Ask questions about their activity and listen to them.

Let your children lead the activity and follow them to build their confidence and autonomy. 😃

👀 Say what you see - describing everything and supporting your children’s actions.

Be positive, praise your children and enjoy spending this time with them. 😃💚

text:
*وقت مع بعض*

قضاء الوقت مع أطفالك فقط والاهتمام فيهم راح يحسن علاقتكم.

لما يلعب أطفالك لحالهم أو يكونوا مشغولين، انضم إلهم وبيّن لهم اهتمامك بما يفعلوا.

👂 اسألهم عن النشاط اللي يعملوا وكونوا مستمعين جيدين.

خلي أطفالك يقودوا النشاط واتبعهم ليزيدوا ثقتهم بنفسهم واستقلاليتهم. 😃

👀 قول شو بتشوف - صف كل إشيء وادعم تصرفات أطفالك.

كون إيجابي، امدح أطفالك واستمتعوا مع بعض في هذا الوقت. 😃💚

actions.text:
*Animals*

🧸 *Active Animals* 
Take turns with your children doing animal actions. You might hop like a frog, stretch like a cat, run like a dog, slither like a snake, or flap like a bird. Add your own actions and animals!

💡*All the Animals We Can Think Of* 
Think about groups of animals and talk about them with your children! 
What are all the animals we can think of that have feathers? What are all the animals we can think of that eat plants? 🌱 What animals can we think of that lay eggs?

text:
*الحيوانات*

*الحيوانات النشيطة*
تبادل الأدوار مع أطفالك وقلّدوا حركات الحيوانات. ممكن تقفزوا مثل الضفدع، أو تتمددوا مثل القطة، أو تركضوا مثل الكلب، أو تزحفوا مثل الحية، أو ترفرفوا مثل الطير. أضف حركات وحيوانات تانية.

*كل الحيوانات اللي بتيجي ع بالنا*
فكر بمجموعات حيوانات واحكي عنها مع أطفالك!
شو كل الحيوانات اللي بتيجي عبالنا عندها ريش؟ شو كل الحيوانات اللي بتيجي عبالنا بتاكل نباتات؟ شو الحيوانات اللي بتيجي عبالنا بتبيض؟

actions.text:
*Active Counting*

👋 *Clap, hop, jump*
 Play the following game with your children. Make it active!

1️⃣ Clap hands 1 time. 
2️⃣ Clap hands 2 times.
1️⃣ Jump 1 time. 
2️⃣ Jump 2 times.
1️⃣ Hop 1 time.
3️⃣ Hop 3 times.
💡 Can you hop, then jump, then clap? 
🏆 Can you clap twice, jump once, and hop three times?

💡 *Remembering Instructions*
Take turns playing a game where you give 2-3 instructions that the other person has to remember to follow. Make sure physical movement is included!
For example:
Hop twice, turn around.
Take ten steps forward, three steps to the side and sit down. ✅

text:
*العد النشط*

*صفقوا، اقفزوا على قدم واحدة، اقفزوا*
العب هاي اللعبة مع أطفالك. وخليها نشطة

صفقوا مرة
2️⃣ صفقوا تنتين.
اقفزوا مرة
2️⃣ اقفزوا تنتين.
1️⃣ اقفزوا على قدم واحدة مرة.
3️⃣ اقفزوا على قدم واحدة تلات مرات.
بتقدروا تقفزوا على قدم واحدة وبعدين تقفزوا وبعدين تصفقوا؟
بتقدروا تصفقوا تنتين. وبعدين تقفزوا مرة وبعدين تقفزوا على قدم واحدة تلات مرات؟

💡 *حفظ التعليمات*
بدّلوا الأدوار بلعبة تعطي فيها 2-3 تعليمات لازم الشخص الثاني يتذكرها ويعملها. خلي الحركة الجسدية تكون جزء من التعليمات!
مثلًا:
اقفزوا على قدم واحدة تنتين. لفوا حواليكم.
خذوا عشر خطوات لقدام، وتلاتة خطوات على جنب، واقعدوا. ✅

actions.text:
*Active Songs*

😃 Young children love physical games but they need reminders about how to play. 💡
🎵 Songs with movements are fun and active and give instructions on how to move!

Sing songs to your children in which they have to follow instructions like:
✅ Start and stop ❌
⬇️ Slow down and speed up ⬆️

text:
*أغاني نشطة*

الأطفال الصغار بيحبوا الألعاب البدنية، لكن بيحتاجوا تذكرهم كيف يلعبوا
الأغاني مع الحركات ممتعة ونشيطة وبتعطي تعليمات كيف يتحركوا!

غنّوا لأطفالكم أغاني ينفذوا فيها تعليمات مثل:
ابدأ ووقف
أبطأ وأسرع

You are not alone 🤲. Many other people are also going through very hard times, including war or having to leave their homes 💔. Many people share your pain as you face so many losses and uncertainties.

When life is this hard, it's normal to feel overwhelmed 😣.

Today’s tips are about ways you can take care of yourself 🌱, even when it is very difficult.
Remember, when you take good care of yourself, it can help you take good care of your children.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3️⃣ tips to help you care for yourself so you can care for your children: 
1️⃣ *BREATHE*
2️⃣ *BREATHE TOGETHER WITH YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *CONNECT AND SHARE*
Here are 3️⃣ tips to help:

1️⃣ *BREATHE*

Listen to your breath 🌬️ as it goes in and out.
Place your hands on your chest or tummy and feel how it rises and falls with each breath.
Then, listen to your breath in a calm, gentle way for a while🌄.

2️⃣ *BREATHE TOGETHER WITH YOUR CHILDREN*

 🗓️ Do these breathing practices every day together with your children. It will help you and them learn to manage stress 🌱.

3️⃣ *CONNECT AND SHARE*

If your stress feels overwhelming, please contact a trusted person, organisation or helpline. Type HELP after these tips for more information.

💙 Thank you for joining us today. You are truly great.
Coping with your fears and stresses 🌊 is the first step to caring for yourself 💪 and helping others 🤝.

actions.text:
In these times, it can be hard for us as parents to help our children feel secure.

Today's tips are about helping your children cope with trauma from war, displacement, and other hardships 🌍💔.

It is possible that your children are feeling upset, angry, or confused. They need your support.

There are some simple things you can do! 🌟

Press Play ▶️ to learn 5️⃣ tips on how you can support your children during these tough times: 
1️⃣ *LISTEN*
2️⃣ *ACCEPT & BE SENSITIVE*
3️⃣ *BE HONEST*
4️⃣ *PRAISE YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN*
5️⃣ *THERE IS HELP*
Here are 5️⃣ tips on how you can support your children during these times:

1️⃣ *LISTEN*

👂 Listen to your children carefully when they express their feelings and try to empathise.

2️⃣ *ACCEPT & BE SENSITIVE*

🌱 Accept whatever they are feeling and give them comfort that such feelings are quite normal under these circumstances.

🛑 If your children do not want to talk about this situation, do not insist.

3️⃣ *BE HONEST*

If your children ask a question about what is happening, be honest in your response and share information that is appropriate for their age.

Try to have a compassionate attitude and accept any feelings they have.

4️⃣ *PRAISE YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN*

🌟 Every night, praise yourself and your children for something, however small. 

This will make you and your children feel better and will help build a caring relationship between you 🦋.

5️⃣ *THERE IS HELP*

🤝If you have any concerns regarding a child’s feelings and behaviours, then please contact a trusted person, organisation, or helpline. Type HELP after these tips, or any time you need help, for more information.
Thank you for joining us today 💙. No matter how upset or tired you are, you are amazing parents.

actions.text: Today's tips are about practical ways to cope during difficult times.
Even though it’s hard, try to practise simple daily habits 🗓️ because routines help children feel secure.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 5️⃣ practical, daily habits you can do every day that will help you and your children cope with your current situation:  
1️⃣ *SPEND TIME TOGETHER*
2️⃣ *ASK YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *APPRECIATE YOUR CHILDREN*
4️⃣ *HELP OTHERS*
5️⃣ *BE PRESENT*
Here are 5️⃣ tips for building practical habits you can do every day that will help you and your children cope with your current situation:

1️⃣ *SPEND TIME TOGETHER*

If it is possible, try to make a routine for spending time together 🕒. 

🔁 You can engage children in daily activities, such as telling a story, praying together, or sharing at least one meal together.

2️⃣ *ASK YOUR CHILDREN*

Ask children what they want to do. 

If you can’t do that activity now, it’s still a chance to connect with your children emotionally 🤍.

After this lesson, you can type PLAY to get some activity ideas to do with children 📝.

3️⃣ *APPRECIATE YOUR CHILDREN*

Take a moment every day to appreciate your children for engaging in activities with you 🌿.

4️⃣ *HELP OTHERS*

Helping others can also make you feel better 🤍. Even a smile can help someone else feel better 🌱.

Our children can learn calmness and kindness from us 💙.

5️⃣ *BE PRESENT*

When spending time with your children, be as present as possible. Listen to them👂 and look at them 👀 when they talk.

Pay your full attention to them, this will help validate, reassure, and comfort children 🤍.

✅⬜️
You’ve completed 50% of this tip! Press NEXT to continue.
Here are some regular activities you might want to try to do with your children:
Share one meal together
Getting ready to sleep
Exercise daily
Daily play activities

Thank you for joining us 💙. 

Our children learn to show peace, love, and empathy from us 🌿.  

Playing and talking to children every day helps them feel secure 🛡️. You’re doing so much to care for your children! 🌟

actions.text: In these times that are so hard, we often have extra stress and tension, and it’s normal that we feel more anger.

In case of any uncertainty, children observe and imitate the behaviours of their elders 👀.

Children can learn to be calm from us, which helps them face challenges 🌸.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 4️⃣ tips that can help you cope with negative emotions while encouraging children: 
1️⃣ *SHARE YOUR FEELINGS*
2️⃣ *BREATHE*
3️⃣ *REASSURE YOUR CHILD*
4️⃣ *THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO CARE*
Here are 4️⃣ tips that can help you cope with negative emotions and also encourage your children:

1️⃣ *SHARE YOUR FEELINGS*

When you are feeling stress, tension or anger, find someone who you can share your feelings with, like a family member or friend.

Avoid substance abuse as a stress coping mechanism. 
 
If your stress feels overwhelming, you can contact an organization or helpline for extra support. Type HELP after these tips for more information🤲.

2️⃣ *BREATHE*

When you feel extremely angry, take a ten-second break or pause before you engage with anyone, including your children ⏸️.
Take five deep breaths🌬️.
Then try to respond in a calmer way 🕊️.

3️⃣ *REASSURE YOUR CHILDREN*
It’s ok to show your concern and emotions to your children 💬. This will help them learn about their own emotions. It’s also good to remind them that we believe that one day hope and justice will prevail ✨.

Reassure your children that one day, war will end and our community will be able to rebuild and thrive together 🌿.
Share stories with them of how people in the past have worked together and come out of traumatic situations 📖.

4️⃣ *THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO CARE*

Assure your children that friends, relatives, or charitable organisations will try to find ways to help them in these situations 🤲.
Thank you for being here with us today 💙. Be proud of yourself every time you manage your negative feelings and encourage your children. You are an amazing parent! ✨

actions.text: In today's tips, we will talk about some simple safety plans you can make with your children 📝.
It can help your children when they see that you have plans 💙.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 4️⃣ tips to help you get ready to travel with children in a crisis situation: 
1️⃣ *PROTECT YOUR DOCUMENTS*
2️⃣ *HIDE MONEY*
3️⃣ *SUPERVISE YOUR CHILDREN*
4️⃣ *COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR CHILDREN*
Here are 4️⃣ tips to help you plan for safety with your children:

1️⃣ *PROTECT YOUR DOCUMENTS*

Take pictures 📷 or make copies of any identity documents or cards and hide these in separate secure places 🛡️.

2️⃣ *HIDE MONEY*

Also hide any money you have separately in different places, so that if something is lost, you won’t lose everything 💙.

3️⃣ *SUPERVISE YOUR CHILDREN*

🤍 Try your best to keep children with you or someone you trust. 
Make sure you know that the people your children spend time with in person and online are trustworthy ✔️.

4️⃣ *COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR CHILDREN*

Tell your children they should not spend time outside alone after dark 🚫 or take a lift with someone alone.
Thank you for joining us today. 🌟 Praise yourself for doing the best you can.

actions.text: In these tips, we will talk about ways you can be prepared to travel safely with your children 💙.
Your children will feel reassured knowing you have a plan 📝.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3 things you can do to ensure that you and your children are as safe as possible when you are on the move:

1️⃣ *MOVE SAFELY*
2️⃣ *PREPARE YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *MAKE A SAFETY NOTE*
Here are 3️⃣ things you can do to ensure that you and your children are as safe as possible when you are on the move:

1️⃣ *MOVE SAFELY*

🔒 Travel in a group of people you know, and don’t give any ID documents or cards to anyone, where possible.

2️⃣ *PREPARE YOUR CHILDREN*

🎵Make a song or chant with your children to help them memorise your full name and phone number, and number of someone you trust. 

🔁 Go over it every day.

📍Every day, agree on a clear place to meet if you are separated from each other.

3️⃣ *MAKE A SAFETY NOTE*

🗒️ Make a safety note for each child.
Write the full name & phone number of yourself and three people you trust, plus any medication your child needs and any special needs they have. 

Cover the note in plastic and hide it in something they always wear.
Thank you for joining us 💙. You are being prepared – we are proud of you 🌟.

actions.text:
Today's tips are about protecting our children from harassment. 

During difficult times, children are more likely to face harassment.
Talking to children about these things can help keep them safe 🛡️.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3️⃣ tips for protecting your children from harassment: 
1️⃣ *"NO" IS OK!*
2️⃣ *TEACH YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *COMFORT YOUR CHILDREN*
Here are 3️⃣ tips for protecting your children from harassment:

1️⃣ *”NO” IS OK!*

Teach your children that nobody has the right to touch them.

In order to stop someone who tries to do that, practice saying and shouting “NO” with your children.

2️⃣ *TEACH YOUR CHILDREN*

Talk to your children about dangerous people and places. Make plans together about how to avoid danger.

3️⃣ *COMFORT YOUR CHILDREN*

If your children tell you they were abused, always believe them. 

Tell them that it’s not their fault and you love them 💙.

You can type HELP for resources if your children share about abuse with you.
Thank you for joining us today💙. Remember that talking to children about these things helps keep them safe.

actions.text:
These tips are about helping your children in the case of loved ones dying. 

Losing a loved one is painful for everyone, including children. 

It is possible that your children appear to be happy but deep inside are sad.
Talking to your children about death can be hard, but it will help them make sense of what is happening.

Here are 5️⃣ tips on how to help your children when loved ones die:
1️⃣ *TALK WITH CHILDREN* 
2️⃣ *LISTEN AND ACCEPT*
3️⃣ *SAY GOODBYE*
4️⃣ *NO BLAMING*
5️⃣ *BE CLEAR*
Here are 5️⃣ tips on how to help your children when loved ones die:

1️⃣ *TALK WITH CHILDREN* 

Children often sense the pain of loss or death, even if they don't know yet what happened. 
Tell them in simple and honest words that the person has passed away. 
💙Be sensitive to their emotions and try to create a compassionate space when you talk with them about the death of loved ones.

2️⃣ *LISTEN AND ACCEPT*

Listen to your children. Accept anything they are feeling and show them affection.

3️⃣ *SAY GOODBYE*

Do something together to say goodbye to the person who had died – consider a prayer 🤲 or a letter 📃.

4️⃣ *NO BLAMING*

Sometimes we feel like loss is our fault, even when it is not, and children may feel this way too. 
Many people have these feelings. Remind yourself it’s not your fault and help your children see it’s not their fault either 💙.

5️⃣ *BE CLEAR*

text:
These tips are about helping your children in the case of loved ones dying. 

Losing a loved one is painful for everyone, including children. 

It is possible that your children appear to be happy but deep inside are sad.
الحكي مع أطفالك عن الموت ممكن يكون صعب، لكن رح يساعدهم يفهموا اللي عم بصير حواليهم.

Here are 5️⃣ tips on how to help your children when loved ones die:
1️⃣ *TALK WITH CHILDREN* 
2️⃣ *LISTEN AND ACCEPT*
3️⃣ *SAY GOODBYE*
4️⃣ *NO BLAMING*
5️⃣ *BE CLEAR*
هاي 5️⃣ نصائح لمساعدة أطفالك في حالة وفاة أحد الأحباء:

1️⃣ *TALK WITH CHILDREN* 

Children often sense the pain of loss or death, even if they don't know yet what happened. 
Tell them in simple and honest words that the person has passed away. 
💙Be sensitive to their emotions and try to create a compassionate space when you talk with them about the death of loved ones.

2️⃣ *LISTEN AND ACCEPT*

Listen to your children. Accept anything they are feeling and show them affection.

3️⃣ *SAY GOODBYE*

Do something together to say goodbye to the person who had died – consider a prayer 🤲 or a letter 📃.

4️⃣ *NO BLAMING*

Sometimes we feel like loss is our fault, even when it is not, and children may feel this way too. 
Many people have these feelings. Remind yourself it’s not your fault and help your children see it’s not their fault either 💙.

5️⃣ *BE CLEAR*

Tell children clearly who will be taking care of them now, if a change needs to happen.

✅⬜️
You’ve completed 50% of this tip! Press NEXT to continue.
خلّّونا نفهم كيف الأطفال من أعمار مختلفة بيتعاملوا مع الموت عشان نقدر ندعمهم.

شكراً على إنضمامك إلنا.

لو كان شعورك بالحزن فوق تحمّلك، احكي مع شخص بتثق فيه، أو منظَّمة، أو خط مُساعدة بكتابة .

خد لحظات لحالك عشان تحزن على خسارتك 💔. لأنه الحُزن هو طريق للشفاء إلك ولأطفالك.

actions.text: Congratulations on reaching our final set of tips! 🎉 Here we are talking about ways to build your and your children’s strength and to encourage good behaviours in them.
Even in these times that are so hard, there is hope that you can build strength, and when your children sense your love and appreciation, it helps them build their own strength, too. 🦋

Press Play ▶️ to learn 2️⃣ simple tips that can help you encourage your children to build strength:

1️⃣ *INVOLVE YOUR CHILDREN*
2️⃣ *PRAISE THEM*
Here are 2️⃣ simple tips that can help you to encourage your children to build strength:

1️⃣ *INVOLVE YOUR CHILDREN*

Ask children to help in simple chores 💪. This will give them a sense of responsibility.

2️⃣ *PRAISE THEM*
💙Appreciate children when they are trying or doing something good.

This will help them to do good again.

🌟 Praising children shows them that you notice and care, and helps build confidence.

You can also build your own strength 💪 by remembering that you are not alone. 
Sharing your sorrow and worries with someone you trust often helps lighten the burden 🤝. 

If your sorrow and worries feel overwhelming, please contact a trusted person, organisation or helpline. Type HELP after these tips for more information.

Thank you for being here with us today and for all our tips 💙. You are doing so much to care for yourself and your children. 

Remember that appreciating your children makes them realise that you give them attention and love 🤍. You can be proud of yourself.  You are truly great 🌟!

actions.text:
You are not alone 🤲. Many other people are also going through very hard times, including war or having to leave their homes 💔. Many people share your pain as you face so many losses and uncertainties.

When life is this hard, it's normal to feel overwhelmed 😣.

Today’s tips are about ways you can take care of yourself 🌱, even when it is very difficult.
Remember, when you take good care of yourself, it can help you take good care of your children.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3️⃣ tips to help you care for yourself so you can care for your children: 
1️⃣ *BREATHE*
2️⃣ *BREATHE TOGETHER WITH YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *CONNECT AND SHARE*
Here are 3️⃣ tips to help:

1️⃣ *BREATHE*

Listen to your breath 🌬️ as it goes in and out.
Place your hands on your chest or tummy and feel how it rises and falls with each breath.
Then, listen to your breath in a calm, gentle way for a while🌄.

2️⃣ *BREATHE TOGETHER WITH YOUR CHILDREN*

 🗓️ Do these breathing practices every day together with your children. It will help you and them learn to manage stress 🌱.

3️⃣ *CONNECT AND SHARE*

If your stress feels overwhelming, please contact a trusted person, organisation or helpline. Type HELP after these tips for more information.

actions.text:
In these times, it can be hard for us as parents to help our children feel secure.

Today's tips are about helping your children cope with trauma from war, displacement, and other hardships 🌍💔.

It is possible that your children are feeling upset, angry, or confused. They need your support.

There are some simple things you can do! 🌟

Press Play ▶️ to learn 5️⃣ tips on how you can support your children during these tough times: 
1️⃣ *LISTEN*
2️⃣ *ACCEPT & BE SENSITIVE*
3️⃣ *BE HONEST*
4️⃣ *PRAISE YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN*
5️⃣ *THERE IS HELP*
Here are 5️⃣ tips on how you can support your children during these times:

1️⃣ *LISTEN*

👂 Listen to your children carefully when they express their feelings and try to empathise.

2️⃣ *ACCEPT & BE SENSITIVE*

🌱 Accept whatever they are feeling and give them comfort that such feelings are quite normal under these circumstances.

🛑 If your children do not want to talk about this situation, do not insist.

3️⃣ *BE HONEST*

If your children ask a question about what is happening, be honest in your response and share information that is appropriate for their age.

Try to have a compassionate attitude and accept any feelings they have.

4️⃣ *PRAISE YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN*

🌟 Every night, praise yourself and your children for something, however small. 

This will make you and your children feel better and will help build a caring relationship between you 🦋.

5️⃣ *THERE IS HELP*

🤝If you have any concerns regarding a child’s feelings and behaviours, then please contact a trusted person, organisation, or helpline. Type HELP after these tips, or any time you need help, for more information.

actions.text: Today's tips are about practical ways to cope during difficult times.
Even though it’s hard, try to practise simple daily habits 🗓️ because routines help children feel secure.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 5️⃣ practical, daily habits you can do every day that will help you and your children cope with your current situation:  
1️⃣ *SPEND TIME TOGETHER*
2️⃣ *ASK YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *APPRECIATE YOUR CHILDREN*
4️⃣ *HELP OTHERS*
5️⃣ *BE PRESENT*
Here are 5️⃣ tips for building practical habits you can do every day that will help you and your children cope with your current situation:

1️⃣ *SPEND TIME TOGETHER*

If it is possible, try to make a routine for spending time together 🕒. 

🔁 You can engage children in daily activities, such as telling a story, praying together, or sharing at least one meal together.

2️⃣ *ASK YOUR CHILDREN*

Ask children what they want to do. 

If you can’t do that activity now, it’s still a chance to connect with your children emotionally 🤍.

After this lesson, you can type PLAY to get some activity ideas to do with children 📝.

3️⃣ *APPRECIATE YOUR CHILDREN*

Take a moment every day to appreciate your children for engaging in activities with you 🌿.

4️⃣ *HELP OTHERS*

Helping others can also make you feel better 🤍. Even a smile can help someone else feel better 🌱.

Our children can learn calmness and kindness from us 💙.

5️⃣ *BE PRESENT*

When spending time with your children, be as present as possible. Listen to them👂 and look at them 👀 when they talk.

Pay your full attention to them, this will help validate, reassure, and comfort children 🤍.

✅⬜️

Share one meal together
Getting ready to sleep
Exercise daily
Daily play activities

actions.text: In these times that are so hard, we often have extra stress and tension, and it’s normal that we feel more anger.

In case of any uncertainty, children observe and imitate the behaviours of their elders 👀.

Children can learn to be calm from us, which helps them face challenges 🌸.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 4️⃣ tips that can help you cope with negative emotions while encouraging children: 
1️⃣ *SHARE YOUR FEELINGS*
2️⃣ *BREATHE*
3️⃣ *REASSURE YOUR CHILD*
4️⃣ *THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO CARE*
Here are 4️⃣ tips that can help you cope with negative emotions and also encourage your children:

1️⃣ *SHARE YOUR FEELINGS*

When you are feeling stress, tension or anger, find someone who you can share your feelings with, like a family member or friend.

Avoid substance abuse as a stress coping mechanism. 
 
If your stress feels overwhelming, you can contact an organization or helpline for extra support. Type HELP after these tips for more information🤲.

2️⃣ *BREATHE*

When you feel extremely angry, take a ten-second break or pause before you engage with anyone, including your children ⏸️.
Take five deep breaths🌬️.
Then try to respond in a calmer way 🕊️.

3️⃣ *REASSURE YOUR CHILDREN*
It’s ok to show your concern and emotions to your children 💬. This will help them learn about their own emotions. It’s also good to remind them that we believe that one day hope and justice will prevail ✨.

Reassure your children that one day, war will end and our community will be able to rebuild and thrive together 🌿.
Share stories with them of how people in the past have worked together and come out of traumatic situations 📖.

4️⃣ *THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO CARE*

Assure your children that friends, relatives, or charitable organisations will try to find ways to help them in these situations 🤲.

actions.text: In today's tips, we will talk about some simple safety plans you can make with your children 📝.
It can help your children when they see that you have plans 💙.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 4️⃣ tips to help you get ready to travel with children in a crisis situation: 
1️⃣ *PROTECT YOUR DOCUMENTS*
2️⃣ *HIDE MONEY*
3️⃣ *SUPERVISE YOUR CHILDREN*
4️⃣ *COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR CHILDREN*
Here are 4️⃣ tips to help you plan for safety with your children:

1️⃣ *PROTECT YOUR DOCUMENTS*

Take pictures 📷 or make copies of any identity documents or cards and hide these in separate secure places 🛡️.

2️⃣ *HIDE MONEY*

Also hide any money you have separately in different places, so that if something is lost, you won’t lose everything 💙.

3️⃣ *SUPERVISE YOUR CHILDREN*

🤍 Try your best to keep children with you or someone you trust. 
Make sure you know that the people your children spend time with in person and online are trustworthy ✔️.

4️⃣ *COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR CHILDREN*

Tell your children they should not spend time outside alone after dark 🚫 or take a lift with someone alone.

actions.text: In these tips, we will talk about ways you can be prepared to travel safely with your children 💙.
Your children will feel reassured knowing you have a plan 📝.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3 things you can do to ensure that you and your children are as safe as possible when you are on the move:

1️⃣ *MOVE SAFELY*
2️⃣ *PREPARE YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *MAKE A SAFETY NOTE*
Here are 3️⃣ things you can do to ensure that you and your children are as safe as possible when you are on the move:

1️⃣ *MOVE SAFELY*

🔒 Travel in a group of people you know, and don’t give any ID documents or cards to anyone, where possible.

2️⃣ *PREPARE YOUR CHILDREN*

🎵Make a song or chant with your children to help them memorise your full name and phone number, and number of someone you trust. 

🔁 Go over it every day.

📍Every day, agree on a clear place to meet if you are separated from each other.

3️⃣ *MAKE A SAFETY NOTE*

🗒️ Make a safety note for each child.
Write the full name & phone number of yourself and three people you trust, plus any medication your child needs and any special needs they have. 

Cover the note in plastic and hide it in something they always wear.

text: في هاي النصائح، رح ننحكي عن طُرق ممكن تستعد فيها للسفر بأمان مع أطفالك 💙.
أطفالك رح يحسّوا بالأمان لمّا يعرفوا إنه عندك خطّة 📝.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3 things you can do to ensure that you and your children are as safe as possible when you are on the move:

1️⃣ *MOVE SAFELY*
2️⃣ *PREPARE YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *MAKE A SAFETY NOTE*
هاي 3️⃣ شغلات بتقدر تعملها عشان تضمن سلامتك إنت وأطفالك قدر الإمكان في أثناء التنقُّل:

1️⃣ *MOVE SAFELY*

🔒 Travel in a group of people you know, and don’t give any ID documents or cards to anyone, where possible.

2️⃣ *PREPARE YOUR CHILDREN*

🎵Make a song or chant with your children to help them memorise your full name and phone number, and number of someone you trust. 

🔁 Go over it every day.

📍Every day, agree on a clear place to meet if you are separated from each other.

3️⃣ *MAKE A SAFETY NOTE*

🗒️ Make a safety note for each child.
Write the full name & phone number of yourself and three people you trust, plus any medication your child needs and any special needs they have. 

Cover the note in plastic and hide it in something they always wear.

actions.text:
Today's tips are about protecting our children from harassment. 

During difficult times, children are more likely to face harassment.
Talking to children about these things can help keep them safe 🛡️.

Press Play ▶️ to learn 3️⃣ tips for protecting your children from harassment: 
1️⃣ *"NO" IS OK!*
2️⃣ *TEACH YOUR CHILDREN*
3️⃣ *COMFORT YOUR CHILDREN*
Here are 3️⃣ tips for protecting your children from harassment:

1️⃣ *”NO” IS OK!*

Teach your children that nobody has the right to touch them.

In order to stop someone who tries to do that, practice saying and shouting “NO” with your children.

2️⃣ *TEACH YOUR CHILDREN*

Talk to your children about dangerous people and places. Make plans together about how to avoid danger.

3️⃣ *COMFORT YOUR CHILDREN*

If your children tell you they were abused, always believe them. 

Tell them that it’s not their fault and you love them 💙.

You can type HELP for resources if your children share about abuse with you.

نصائح اليوم عن كيف نحمي ولادنا من التحرُّش.

في الأوقات الصعبة، بتزيد احتماليّة تعرُّض الأطفال للتحرُّش.
والحكي مع أطفالنا عن هاي المواضيع ممكن يساعد في إنهم يضلّوا بأمان.

actions.text:
These tips are about helping your children in the case of loved ones dying. 

Losing a loved one is painful for everyone, including children. 

It is possible that your children appear to be happy but deep inside are sad.
Talking to your children about death can be hard, but it will help them make sense of what is happening.

Here are 5️⃣ tips on how to help your children when loved ones die:
1️⃣ *TALK WITH CHILDREN* 
2️⃣ *LISTEN AND ACCEPT*
3️⃣ *SAY GOODBYE*
4️⃣ *NO BLAMING*
5️⃣ *BE CLEAR*
Here are 5️⃣ tips on how to help your children when loved ones die:

1️⃣ *TALK WITH CHILDREN* 

Children often sense the pain of loss or death, even if they don't know yet what happened. 
Tell them in simple and honest words that the person has passed away. 
💙Be sensitive to their emotions and try to create a compassionate space when you talk with them about the death of loved ones.

2️⃣ *LISTEN AND ACCEPT*

Listen to your children. Accept anything they are feeling and show them affection.

3️⃣ *SAY GOODBYE*

Do something together to say goodbye to the person who had died – consider a prayer 🤲 or a letter 📃.

4️⃣ *NO BLAMING*

Sometimes we feel like loss is our fault, even when it is not, and children may feel this way too. 
Many people have these feelings. Remind yourself it’s not your fault and help your children see it’s not their fault either 💙.

5️⃣ *BE CLEAR*

Tell children clearly who will be taking care of them now, if a change needs to happen.

✅⬜️
You’ve completed 50% of this tip! Press NEXT to continue.
Let us understand how children of different ages react to death so we can support them.

text:
هاي النصائح لمساعدتك في دعم أطفالك في حالة فقدانهم لشخص عزيز عليهم.

فقدان شخص عزيز مؤلم لكل الناس، وللأطفال كمان.

ممكن أطفالك ببينوا إنهم مبسوطين لكنهم في أعماقهم زعلانين.
الحكي مع أطفالك عن الموت ممكن يكون صعب، لكن رح يساعدهم يفهموا اللي عم بصير حواليهم.

actions.text: Congratulations on reaching our final set of tips! 🎉 Here we are talking about ways to build your and your children’s strength and to encourage good behaviours in them.
Even in these times that are so hard, there is hope that you can build strength, and when your children sense your love and appreciation, it helps them build their own strength, too. 🦋

Press Play ▶️ to learn 2️⃣ simple tips that can help you encourage your children to build strength:

1️⃣ *INVOLVE YOUR CHILDREN*
2️⃣ *PRAISE THEM*
Here are 2️⃣ simple tips that can help you to encourage your children to build strength:

1️⃣ *INVOLVE YOUR CHILDREN*

Ask children to help in simple chores 💪. This will give them a sense of responsibility.

2️⃣ *PRAISE THEM*
💙Appreciate children when they are trying or doing something good.

This will help them to do good again.

🌟 Praising children shows them that you notice and care, and helps build confidence.

You can also build your own strength 💪 by remembering that you are not alone. 
Sharing your sorrow and worries with someone you trust often helps lighten the burden 🤝. 

If your sorrow and worries feel overwhelming, please contact a trusted person, organisation or helpline. Type HELP after these tips for more information.

text: وصلنا لآخر مجموعة من النصائح،أبدعت! 🎉 هاي النصائح بتورجينا طرق نستمدّ فيها قوّة إلنا و لأطفالنا و نشجّع و نعزز السلوكيات المنيحة بأطفالنا.
حتى في أصعب الأوقات ،في أمل إنك تقدر تستجمع قوتك، ولمّا أطفالك يحسّوا بمحبّتك وتقديرك، همّة كمان،  بستمدّوا قوّة إلهم . 🦋

🧡 You are a great parent. Thank you for joining us. 

✅ Participating in ParentText is optional.
✅ We won’t ever ask for your name. Anything you share is safe, private, and anonymous.
✅Your anonymous information may also be shared with others working to help families like yours build strength and hope in tough times. All your information will be private and can’t be linked back to you.
❌You can stop when you want. Just type STOP
